titleStmt.title: The description and use of the double horizontall dyall
titleStmt.author: Oughtred, William, 1575-1660.

notesStmt.note: Dedication (from t.p.): To the most noble, and hopeful gentleman, Sr. William Hovvard Knight of the Bath, and sonne to the right honorable and illustrious lord, Thomas, Earle of Arundel and Surrey, Earle Marshal of England, &c.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
